# Locale.LanguageCode.IdentifierType

**Enumeration**

Types of ISO 639 language code.

## Declaration

```swift
enum IdentifierType
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **Locale.LanguageCode.IdentifierType.alpha2**: Two-letter alpha-2 code, e.g. “en” for English
- **Locale.LanguageCode.IdentifierType.alpha3**: Three-letter alpha-3 code, e.g. “eng” for English

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
